title: Dagger +2
content:
Dagger +2 Rare 3~6 Damage 1d4 +2 Piercing Weapon Enchantment +2 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A light, slender blade, magically honed to stay razor-sharp. Dagger Light Finesse Thrown 0.45 95

Weapon Enchantment +2

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

A light, slender blade, magically honed to stay razor-sharp.

Dagger Light Finesse Thrown

Dagger +2 is one of the Dagger Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features
